mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu ( add_date, group_idx, menu_name, menu_type, modify_date, parent_menu_idx, print_seq, view_yn, menu_url, use_yn ) VALUES ( #{add_date}, ${group_idx}, #{menu_name}, ${menu_type}, #{modify_date}, ${parent_menu_idx}, ${print_seq}, ${view_yn}, #{menu_url}, ${use_yn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET group_idx = ${group_idx}, modify_date = #{modify_date}, parent_menu_idx = ${parent_menu_idx} WHERE menu_idx = ${menu_idx}

UPDATE menu SET menu_name = #{menu_name}, menu_type = ${menu_type}, modify_date = #{modify_date}, print_seq = ${print_seq}, view_yn = ${view_yn}, menu_url = #{menu_url}, use_yn = ${use_yn} WHERE menu_idx = ${menu_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT menu_idx, add_date, group_idx, menu_name, menu_url, menu_type, modify_date, parent_menu_idx, print_seq, view_yn, use_yn FROM (select * from menu order by parent_menu_idx, print_seq) products_sorted, (select @pv := '0') initialisation WHERE find_in_set(parent_menu_idx, @pv) and length(@pv := concat(@pv, ',', menu_idx));

SELECT menu_idx, add_date, group_idx, menu_name, menu_url, menu_type, modify_date, parent_menu_idx, print_seq, view_yn, use_yn FROM (select * from menu where view_yn = 0 and use_yn = 0 order by parent_menu_idx, print_seq) products_sorted, (select @pv := '0') initialisation WHERE find_in_set(parent_menu_idx, @pv) and length(@pv := concat(@pv, ',', menu_idx));

SELECT menu_idx, add_date, group_idx, menu_name, menu_type, menu_url, modify_date, parent_menu_idx, print_seq, view_yn, use_yn FROM (select * from menu where use_yn = 0 order by parent_menu_idx, print_seq) products_sorted, (select @pv := #{id}) initialisation WHERE find_in_set(parent_menu_idx, @pv) and length(@pv := concat(@pv, ',', menu_idx));
SELECT menu_idx, add_date, group_idx, menu_name, menu_type, menu_url, modify_date, parent_menu_idx, print_seq, view_yn, use_yn FROM menu WHERE menu_idx = #{id}
SELECT menu_idx, add_date, group_idx, menu_name, menu_type, menu_url, modify_date, parent_menu_idx, print_seq, view_yn, use_yn FROM menu WHERE menu_name = #{name}
